name: Astro Attack (itch)
description:
Astro Attack is a game where the goal is to survive for as long as possible. The game progressively gets more difficult until eventually only the most skilled can survive!

This game is still in development and any suggestions on how I can improve the game would be greatly appreciated!

Controls:

  • Move Right: Right Arrow or D
  • Move Left: Left Arrow or A
  • Pause: Q
  • Unpause: E
